title: Transfer account problems
body: I was trying to transfer from Oceania to Brazil server. However, there isn't any transfer option in the account section in the store.

replies.body: Transfers out of OC are currently disabled.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help you out.  Just be sure to have the RP ready!
Thank you. I already sent 3 tickets but they didnt reply me.
One ticket is all you need, creating more is likely to cause delays and confusion.  Replying to the ticket without receiving a response will also drop you to the bottom of the queue.  Hang tight!
